data:
Fred was nervous for his golf tournament today. He got to the course and started practicing. As the tournament started, he tried his best. Thankfully he ended up winning. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Fred was ashamed of what he had done.
- Fred was very happy.
Answer: Fred was ashamed of what he had done.

Ed's family had moved to a rural area. Ed learned that he was to be homeschooled. At first he was apprehensive. But then his mom started to make lessons fun! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He loved his mom's lessons.
- He didn't want to have fun at school.
Answer: He loved his mom's lessons.

Morgan and Timothy were having an argument. Morgan thought that all of The Beatles' music was good. Timothy thought their early stuff was not very good. Morgan made her case by simply playing a few songs. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Timothy realized Morgan was probably right about the music.
- Timothy said he didn't want to hear anymore Rolling Stones music.
Answer: Timothy realized Morgan was probably right about the music.

Neil had just arrived in Morocco. He loved the exotic feel of it. The language was beautiful. And the people were so friendly, too! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Neil later hated the country.
- Neil wished he could stay.
Answer: Neil wished he could stay.

Blanche wanted to lose weight. She ate less and exercised more. After a month she began to feel better. She started to notice a difference in the mirror as well. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Blanche was very concerned and scared by her weight loss.
- Blanche was happy about her weight loss.
Answer: Blanche was very concerned and scared by her weight loss.

Rachel loved to play on her piano. One day she was paid to play at a romantic event. She lit candles and put them on her piano. The candles started to burn low. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She caught them before they burned her piano.
- She decided not to do anything.
Answer: She caught them before they burned her piano.

The rich man went to the auction. No one dared to out bid him because they knew they would lose. The rich man bought everything that was up for auction. All the other people got mad that they couldn't win anything. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The rich man was hated.
- Everyone offered to buy the rich man dinner.
Answer: The rich man was hated.

Jan wanted to cook breakfast but she didn't know how. Sue helped her. They made toast, eggs, hashbrowns, and bacon. It looked delicious. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jan refused to eat.
- Jan had fun cooking.
Answer: Jan had fun cooking.

Johnny thought Anita was the girl for him, but he was wrong. He invited her out but she said she didn't feel well. Johnny decided to go to a club, just to drink and listen to music. At midnight, he looked back and saw Anita dancing with another guy. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Johnny wanted to ask Anita out again.
- Johnny did not ask Anita out again.
Answer: Johnny did not ask Anita out again.

Jake was going on a road trip to see his family. He Got in the car and drove. The car's tires exploded due to too much air. Jake hitchhiked for 30 miles. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jake wore a navy blue suit.
- When Jake got to his family he was happy his trip was over.
Answer: When Jake got to his family he was happy his trip was over.

Lance was trying to pick up girls at the club. He offered a couple drinks. Only one agreed but didn't pursue it further. Eventually he got drunk and frustrated. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He decided to take a cab and go home.
- He danced with joy at the fun night he was having.
Answer: He decided to take a cab and go home.

Samantha arrives at the bar for her date early. She decides to look through the magazine sitting on the bar. Samantha becomes engrossed in an article about peaches. By the time her date arrives she has read all about peaches. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Samantha was able to break the ice by talking about peaches.
- Samantha told her date everything she knew about apples.
Answer: Samantha was able to break the ice by talking about peaches.

Wendy was thinking of a number between one and ten. Her mother guessed three, which was correct. Her father guessed seven. Her little brother Sam guessed ten. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Wendy had fun playing this game.
- Wendy told them the number was actually forty two.
Answer: Wendy had fun playing this game.

There was a book series I loved very much. I looked forward to each new installment. When the last book came out, there was a midnight party at the store. I dressed up and went with my friends. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- We all had a good time.
- We all had a terrible time.
Answer: We all had a good time.

Kyle was working as a lifeguard at the local pool. One day, a little boy started thrashing around in the deep side. Kyle realized the boy was drowning. He jumped into the pool and grabbed the boy. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Kyle saved the boy and the boy was thankful.
- Kyle swam out of the pool alone and went home.
Answer: Kyle saved the boy and the boy was thankful.

George found a mistake on his cable bill. He called the cable company's customer service number. George was put on hold for a while. Finally, a man answered the phone who could help George. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- George immediately hung up.
- George explained what was going on with his bill.
Answer: George explained what was going on with his bill.

My cane has a strap. The strap is attached to the end of the cane. The attachment kept coming off. I looked for a different strap. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- My can does not need a new strap.
- I bought a different strap.
Answer: My can does not need a new strap.

Tom loved burgers. He went to his friends house to eat dinner. They were having burgers made of turkey not beef. Tom got angry when he found this out. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Tom complained all evening about the turkey burgers.
- Tom was excited about the turkey burgers.
Answer: Tom complained all evening about the turkey burgers.

I went to trade in my car. I wanted something nice. I found a good car for good price. As I left, I turned on the a/c. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I was happy as the car warmed up.
- The a/c felt nice on a hot day.
Answer: The a/c felt nice on a hot day.

My mom always tells me to wake up and enjoy the sunrise. She tells me I miss out on all of life's beauty staying in. So I woke up extra early and sat on my balcony with some coffee. The sun rose shortly after 6 in the morning. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- It was beautiful and relaxing.
- I never liked my mom.
Answer: It was beautiful and relaxing.

Terry had to catch a bus to make it to work on time. However, she met a series of misfortunes on morning. She lost her shoes and her keys. As she walked to the bus stop, she saw the bus starting to pull away. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Mary missed the bus and had to walk to her destination.
- Mary got on a plane to go to her destination.
Answer: Mary missed the bus and had to walk to her destination.

Timothy had an urge to eat sweets. He was looking everywhere for something sweet to eat. He found what he was looking for. It was a gigantic cupcake his mom made. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Timothy ordered a veggie burger from the new fast food restaurant.
- Timothy eat the cupcake in one big bite.
Answer: Timothy eat the cupcake in one big bite.

Lady loved tacos. Especially from taco trucks. One day she ordered a taco from a truck. With excitement, she took a bite. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She spat it out because she had been served a spoiled fish taco.
- She relished the taste of her banana sundae.
Answer: She spat it out because she had been served a spoiled fish taco.

Rudy really wanted a dog. He begged his parents for one. They said if he cared for it, he could have one. Rudy agreed to walk and feed it every day. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Rudy's parents took him to the shelter to pick out a pet dog.
- Rudy's parents decided not to get him a dog.
Answer: Rudy's parents took him to the shelter to pick out a pet dog.

David was tired of living with all of the ice and snow of Ohio. So he decided to check with his travel agent to see where to go. Unfortunately his travel agent didn't have anything available. David went home, but on his way saw a flyer for a cruise! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He decided to visit Canada instead.
- He booked the trip the second he got home.
Answer: He decided to visit Canada instead.

Jenny and her boyfriend boarded the ship. They were both excited for a boat trip around the harbor. They had never seen it from the water. They set sail and began the cruise. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- They were bored because they had already been on this cruise.
- They were very excited and took lots of pictures.
Answer: They were very excited and took lots of pictures.

Mary ate pudding every day. She ate it for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. One day she ran out of pudding. She then decided to become a chef. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Mary never made pudding as a chef.
- Mary loved sweets.
Answer: Mary never made pudding as a chef.

Blake wanted to marry his girlfriend. He had the money for a ring. However he didn't know what ring to buy. Blake called his girlfriend's sister for help. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The sister helped him find the perfect ring.
- Blake proposed to the sister.
Answer: The sister helped him find the perfect ring.

It was a cold winter night. The roads were slippery. Jim was driving home from work. He lost control of his truck. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jim was happy.
- Jim ended up in the hospital.
Answer: Jim ended up in the hospital.

Nell saw a girl with a cast on her arm at the park. Nell's mom watched as her daughter made a new friend. Later, Nell brought the girl over to show her mom something. Nell had smeared dandelions on the cast to paint it yellow. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Nell's mom thought it was very nice.
- Nell's mom smeared more dandelions on it.
Answer: Nell's mom thought it was very nice.

Lane wanted a puppy. He didn't know where to find one. He asked his friend to help him. They both went to a shelter and Lane found a dog. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Lane was happy he got a kitten.
- Lane promptly adopted the puppy.
Answer: Lane was happy he got a kitten.

Gina was putting posters on her bedroom walls. There was a poster of the cool new girl group. The girls were wearing bright colorful clothing. Gina herself was wearing a brown shirt and khakis. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Gina threw the poster into the trash.
- Gina decided she would wear more colorful clothing.
Answer: Gina decided she would wear more colorful clothing.

Rick lived in Canada. He had never seen a gecko. He decided to travel to New Mexico to find one. He finally saw a gecko! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Rick thought geckos were totally worth the trip.
- Rick was sad his trip was not fruitful.
Answer: Rick thought geckos were totally worth the trip.

Jordan met Sally over two Year's ago and got into a relationship. Suddenly Sally got distant with Jordan. Jordan heard through a friend that Sally was seeing another guy. Jordan confronted Sally and she admitted to seeing another guy. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jordan was sad and broke off his relationship with Sally.
- Jordan was excited and took Sally out to dinner.
Answer: Jordan was sad and broke off his relationship with Sally.

It was a bright sunny day and the Smiths wanted a break. They decided to take a small trip to the beach. Just as they arrived clouds came out and it started raining. They decided to stay and play anyway. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- They had a fantastic time.
- The hated the beach.
Answer: They had a fantastic time.

Lacey had a bunch of chickens. One day, she realized one had laid an egg! She was so excited until she realized the egg was cold. She asked her son about it. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Her son didn't know what she was talking about.
- Her son had taken an egg from the ice box and put it in the nest.
Answer: Her son had taken an egg from the ice box and put it in the nest.

Dan saw a dog shivering in the rainy and thought it looked lost. The dog was friendly enough and Dan was able to bring him home. The animal had no tags or collar and seemed malnourished. Daniel posted signs around the neighborhood and asked his neighbors. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Dan was able to find an owner for the dog.
- Dan gave up and released the dog back into the wild.
Answer: Dan was able to find an owner for the dog.

Penny is from a tropical climate. She has never seen snow. For vacation, she decided to go skiing. Penny saw snow for the first time. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Penny was amazed.
- Penny was used to seeing snow.
Answer: Penny was amazed.

I was stuck in traffic and very hungry. I knew I wouldn't make it home in time, and needed food. I decided to get fast food, but didn't know where from. I finally decided on subway, and parked my car. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I threw away my sandwich.
- I ate my sandwich in four bites.
Answer: I ate my sandwich in four bites.

Em had had digestion issues lately. She visited her doctor. He suggested probiotics and active cultures. Em started to eat enriched yogurt every day. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- After two weeks, she had less bloating and felt better.
- Em stocked up on favorites: bacon, beer and cookies!
Answer: After two weeks, she had less bloating and felt better.

Quentin had never gone hunting before. This last weekend his friends invited him with them. They were going to camp out and hunt for a few days. He agreed to go. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Quentin really enjoyed the hunting trip.
- Quentin went to school.
Answer: Quentin really enjoyed the hunting trip.

One Christmas, I received a shiny and expensive-looking briefcase. The next day, I filled my new case and gathered  my things. I set the briefcase on the roof temporarily while I loaded car. While I was driving, people were beeping at me. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The people were trying to say hello to me.
- I did not realize where my briefcase was.
Answer: The people were trying to say hello to me.

Mick went fishing by himself one morning. He sat in his boat thinking calm thoughts. He got no tugs on his line. In fact, he caught nothing at all all day! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Mick went home, and ate the fish he caught that day.
- Mick sent home relaxed, but empty-handed.
Answer: Mick went home, and ate the fish he caught that day.

Tim had just gotten fired from his job. He had no money and no place to live. He asked his parents if he could stay there. They graciously let him stay at their home. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Tim was glad to have somewhere to stay.
- Tim said he would not be able to afford the rent.
Answer: Tim was glad to have somewhere to stay.

Blake wanted to marry his girlfriend. He had the money for a ring. However he didn't know what ring to buy. Blake called his girlfriend's sister for help. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The sister helped him find the perfect ring.
- Blake proposed to the sister.
Answer: The sister helped him find the perfect ring.

Mary was near the end of a 2 hour dental procedure. The Novocaine was starting to wear off. She could feel her flesh being cut. But the dentist kept going insisting it was only pressure she felt. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She agreed with him and sat calmly as he finished.
- By the end of it she was in tears and being held down.
Answer: She agreed with him and sat calmly as he finished.

Katie had waited till the last day to write her book report. She was nervous and had to hurry. She didn't do a very good job. Her teacher gave her a bad grade. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Katie was upset at herself for waiting until the last minute.
- Katie was excited to join the team.
Answer: Katie was upset at herself for waiting until the last minute.

John attended technical school and studied very hard. He got high marks on his final exams. John graduated first in his class! He received numerous letters of recommendation from his teachers. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He got a great job and lived a happy life.
- After graduation, he was only able to get a job at McDonalds.
Answer: He got a great job and lived a happy life.

A G Bear is a teddy bear with a box. It talks back to you in gibberish. I bought one for my wife when we were young. She gave it to our daughter when she was three. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Our daughter was very thankful for the gift.
- Our daughter felt depressed.
Answer: Our daughter was very thankful for the gift.

Jarett loaned $200 dollars from me. He told me that he was going to pay me back before the end of the week. The next day, I saw him walking with Tony. He was giving her money. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I was very angry at Jarrett.
- Jarrett did not give Tony money.
Answer: I was very angry at Jarrett.

At the restaurant, the waiter gave me the wrong food. I asked the waiter for the correct dinner. The waiter brought me another incorrect order! They messed up my order twice. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I left without paying the waiter a tip.
- I left the waiter a large tip.
Answer: I left without paying the waiter a tip.

The office worker claimed she was the best multitasker in the world. Her boss wanted her to prove it, so she gave her a bunch of jobs. The worker cracked her knuckles and began the list of jobs. The worker worked with a great flurry and speed. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- The office worker gave up and checked into rehab.
- All projects were completed on time and all were  correct.
Answer: The office worker gave up and checked into rehab.

Richard lives in the Philippines with his wife and two daughters. His oldest daughter is studying to be a police investigator. His youngest daughter will graduate high school this May. Right after Micah graduates the family is moving to America. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Richard and his family are very anti-American.
- They are very excited for a new life.
Answer: Richard and his family are very anti-American.

The Oakland Raiders' starting quarterback was injured. Dave was their backup quarterback. Dave practiced the entire week with the first string offense. Dave felt he was ready to start the next  scheduled game. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Dave felt prepared for the game.
- Dave decided to leave the game.
Answer: Dave felt prepared for the game.

Taj loved to eat McDonalds. He wrote McDonald's an email appreciating them for their service. A McDonald's representative was able to reply the next day. Taj got $50 worth of McDonalds coupons in the mail! What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He was sad about getting the coupons.
- He invited some friends to have lunch with him at McDonalds.
Answer: He was sad about getting the coupons.

When I woke up in the morning, I went downstairs. I smelled the smoke coming from the turkey. I also smelled ham, macaroni and cheese and lasagna. My mom finished cooked everyone and asked me to sit down. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I turned around and went back to bed.
- I sat down and continued to enjoy the smells from the kitchen.
Answer: I sat down and continued to enjoy the smells from the kitchen.

Brady came across a yard sale by one of his neighbor's house. They were giving away some personal belongings that are old. He found this set of clothes that he was interested in. The neighbor told him that it was $30 dollars for all three shirts. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Brady decided to go for a run.
- Brady decided not to buy the shirts.
Answer: Brady decided not to buy the shirts.

Vanessa hired a babysitter that liked to snoop. She snooped in makeup drawers. She snooped in jewelry boxes. She snooped in medicine cabinets. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Vanessa gave the babysitter a raise.
- Vanessa caught her snooping, and fired her.
Answer: Vanessa caught her snooping, and fired her.

Jenny and her boyfriend boarded the ship. They were both excited for a boat trip around the harbor. They had never seen it from the water. They set sail and began the cruise. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- They were bored because they had already been on this cruise.
- They were very excited and took lots of pictures.
Answer: They were bored because they had already been on this cruise.

Trisha's son got sick last night at eight. He vomited all over her and the floor. Trisha cleaned up and changed his clothes. He continued to be sick over and over again. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Trisha made the child sleep on the kitchen floor with  a blanket.
- Trisha let the children decorate the  tree with popcorn.
Answer: Trisha made the child sleep on the kitchen floor with  a blanket.

My friend had a bachelor party before her wedding. A group of us got together and went out on the town. We had dinner and drinks at a Mexican restaurant. We then got in a limo and went bar hopping. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- We had an uneventful night.
- We had a great time.
Answer: We had a great time.

Jack loved to jump around. He was just a little kid that loved to jump. One day he jumped one too many times. And landed on a lego piece. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jack decided to jump again because it felt great.
- Jack's foot hurt horribly and he decided to be more careful.
Answer: Jack decided to jump again because it felt great.

Colin started fifth grade at a new school. He was very shy. He thought no one would befriend him due to his shyness. But Colin's classmates were encouraging and kind. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Colin made lots of friends.
- All the kids at Colin's school hated him.
Answer: Colin made lots of friends.

Jim's school was having a blood drive. Jim decided to volunteer. A nurse pricked Jim in the arm. The entire process took an hour. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jim didn't have any blood drawn.
- Jim felt proud.
Answer: Jim felt proud.

Mary liked jumping rope. She would do it all the time. It kept her in good shape. She always had energy. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Mary lost her job because she didn't have any stamina.
- Mary was glad she learned to jump rope.
Answer: Mary was glad she learned to jump rope.

Gina's grandma had made up beds for everyone. Gina's siblings slept with their grandma. There was no room for Gina in that bed. Her parents slept together in her mother twin bed. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Gina decided to sleep on the couch alone.
- Gina climbed into her grandma's bed, and went to sleep.
Answer: Gina decided to sleep on the couch alone.

Ted and Wanda were excited about taking a trip. They were only able to go for the day so they had to leave early. They packed up the car and headed out for the beach. They spent all day having a great time on the beach. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- They decided next time they would try a two-day trip.
- They decided never to visit the beach again.
Answer: They decided next time they would try a two-day trip.

Penny went to the arcade to play his favorite game. He put 2 quarters inside the pacman machine. He played vigorously until his hands hurt. The game made a sound when he beat the last level. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Penny loved gaming.
- Penny was not very competitive.
Answer: Penny loved gaming.

Stella had a basketball game tonight. She wanted to skip the game, or sit on the bench. She wasn't really feeling well. But her coach insisted she play. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Stella struggled through the basketball game.
- Suddenly, she felt better.
Answer: Stella struggled through the basketball game.

Marie had to get a flu shot, but she was afraid of needles. She waited in line for her shot, anxious the whole time. When she sat down in the chair, she thought she would faint. Then, the nurse told her she was done. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Marie felt good and was not anxious anymore.
- Marie felt fear more than ever.
Answer: Marie felt good and was not anxious anymore.

Christian wanted to eat something quick before school. He went into the kitchen and poured some cereal. When he was pouring the milk, he spilled it all over the table. Christian got mad because he had to clean all of it up. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Christian spent the rest of the day in a great mood.
- Christian was worried he was going to be late for school.
Answer: Christian was worried he was going to be late for school.

Ida really wanted hardwood floors in her living room. She worked overtime often to save up the money. Then she shopped for the flooring and had it installed. When she saw her new hardwood floors, she almost cried. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Ida thought the hardwood floors made her house feel like a home.
- Ida re-installed the carpet in the living room the next day.
Answer: Ida thought the hardwood floors made her house feel like a home.

Sandy went into the kitchen to get something to drink. She kept hearing a rattling by the stove but couldn't see anything. She opened the fridge to get the pitcher of tea. About that time out pops the mouse from the stove. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Sandy screamed and ran!
- Sandy poured some tea in a saucer for the mouse.
Answer: Sandy screamed and ran!.

There was a book series I loved very much. I looked forward to each new installment. When the last book came out, there was a midnight party at the store. I dressed up and went with my friends. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- We all had a good time.
- We all had a terrible time.
Answer: We all had a good time.

Wallace had a passion for gardening. He had been gardening since he was ten years of age. Wallace followed his passion well into his college years. Wallace graduated from college with a degree in biology. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He used his knowledge to become a professional gardener.
- He used his knowledge to become a professional taxi driver.
Answer: He used his knowledge to become a professional gardener.

Neil was touring the Greek islands. He had rented a small motorboat. He traveled from island to island. Neil was having a wonderful time. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- He loved the clean, fresh air.
- The shark in the boat swung his head around and bit his leg.
Answer: He loved the clean, fresh air.

Bryan took his girlfriend to the movies. They went to a comedy. He bought popcorn and drinks. They laughed a lot. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Brian's girlfriend left him.
- Brian and his girlfriend had sex after they got home.
Answer: Brian and his girlfriend had sex after they got home.

Mike went with his friends to party in Tijuana. They all drank too much and slept way too little. Returning from the trip, Mike couldn't find his license. As they approached the border, he was extremely nervous. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- One of Mike's friends realized he had the license in wallet.
- Mike was sure he would pass through without incident.
Answer: One of Mike's friends realized he had the license in wallet.

Rachel's mother always made her and the kids Kool-Aid. One day Rachel was very thirsty. She decided to make herself Kool-Aid for the first time. She dumped the package in water and stirred it up and took a sip. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- She realized she mixed in too much water and it tasted bad.
- She realized a hotdog would be great instead.
Answer: She realized she mixed in too much water and it tasted bad.

Yesterday I was putting up the Christmas tree. I picked up the prettiest ornaments. As I picked one up, it dropped. The glass shattered. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- I cleaned it up with a broom.
- I let my dog eat it.
Answer: I cleaned it up with a broom.

Jane purchase a backpack online for her teenage nephew. She was pleased to see how excited he was when she gave it to him. He hurriedly ripped the plastic wrap off the backpack. When he tried it on it was too small. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jane was relieved.
- Jane was disappointed.
Answer: Jane was disappointed.

Abigail's cat jumped out of her arms and ran down the road. The skittish cat saw a dog and ran up a tree. The cat was stuck and could not get down. Abigail called the fire department, and they came right away. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Abigail was relieved to get her kitty out of the tree.
- Abigail was disappointed to get her kitty out of the tree.
Answer: Abigail was relieved to get her kitty out of the tree.

It was Paula's first day of Kindergarten. She was excited to be one of the big kids. When it came time to leave her mother at the door, she cried. Eventually Paula left her mother and took a seat in class. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Paula eventually became accustomed to being away from her mother.
- Paula's mother took a seat next to Paula.
Answer: Paula eventually became accustomed to being away from her mother.

Mike and his buddies wanted something to do. They looked around and realized they had several guns and goggles. They decided to go outside and play airsoft. They set up in a forest and played all afternoon. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Mike had a great time.
- Mike had a terrible time.
Answer: Mike had a great time.

Jake bought a metal detector. He took it to the beach to try it out. His metal detector found things buried in the sand. It frequently found quarters. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- Jake saved up a lot of money just using his metal detector.
- Jake despised his metal detector.
Answer: Jake saved up a lot of money just using his metal detector.

We bought a new house. It was perfect, and everything I ever wanted. There was a white fence and a large wrap around porch. Our kids will have so many great memories in this house. What is a possible continuation for the story given the following options ?
- We were so happy.
- We are so angry.
